data.title: Blue Ridge Christian School Average Salaries
data.meta_description: What is the average salary of a Blue Ridge Christian School employee per year? Explore company details, Job salaries, nearby and related companies.
data.text:
View salary at Blue Ridge Christian School by Job Title BETA

The average salary of Blue Ridge Christian School jobs will vary depending on the location, industry, category, and department. The table below shows the job titles you might be interested in and the salary range of different positions at Blue Ridge Christian School. A difference in pay for the same job title may be based on a number of factors, such as experience, training, level of education, skills and competencies, and so on. Case Management Program Clinical Coordinator Bilingual Required jobs at Blue Ridge Christian School earn the most with an average annual salary of $90,879, while Caregiver jobs earn the least with an average annual salary of $0.

The estimate average salary for Blue Ridge Christian School employees is around $74,254 per year, or the hourly rate of Blue Ridge Christian School rate is $36. The highest earners in the top 75th percentile are paid over $84,807. Individual salaries will vary depending on the job, department, and location, as well as the employeeâ€™s level of education, certifications, and additional skills.
